level.text: OAH will provide oral or sign language interpretation services upon request for persons seeking information or participating in a hearing. An Administrative Law Judge may order the use of such services at a hearing.
A person who needs those services for a hearing shall request them as early as possible to avoid delay.
Upon request by a party with impaired vision, OAH will provide official documents in Braille or large print within seven (7) business days.
An interpreter at a hearing shall swear or affirm under penalty of perjury to interpret accurately, completely, and impartially.
